dc.title: Model Grand Jury Charge
dc.description: An overview of the responsibilities of a jury member once he or she has been selected for jury service, including the limitation of the power of a grand jury, confidentiality, and grand jury procedures. A model grand jury charge approved by the Judicial Conference of the United States.
